ProjectTitle: Impaired trunk control in children and youth with dyskinetic cerebral palsy: from mobile assessment towards new clinical insights
InitialFeedbackHistory:
22/04/2024
Sharing: pseudonymous data is still personal data under the GDPR which can only be shared under access restrictions, since you are planning to use RDR that is no problem because RDR gives this option, so best to check with the RDR and/or PRET team later in your project when your datasets are ready. When access restrictions are needed you can't select a license but need a data transfer agreement, the RDR team will write this with you and the legal department if needed.
label: good with suggestions
